Title: 【ANN】【ICO】⚽BetOnChart-innovation in betting and biggest football ICO 🏆! MVP! 🔥

Author: betonchart
Title: 【ANN】【ICO】⚽BetOnChart-innovation in betting and biggest football ICO 🏆! MVP! 🔥
Body: Hello, the main difference lies within the way we're looking at the betting process. While in classical betting you are betting on the initial outcome of the match, in Bet On Chart you can make multiple in-play bets during the match. And it's not the score you're betting on - in Bet On Chart you're betting on chart (what's quite obvious  ).  It's very easy and involving, once you've tried it. Just watch the short explainer video here: http://bit.ly/2Mv2nbv, and then try to play in our demo on: betonchart.com  Thanks!

The whole visualization of a football match: a football field ❇️, the rival teams, a ball position ⚽ - every movement is accurate, precise and, what is of utmost importance - live! Due to the cutting-edge technologies 🛰️, and the latest football innovations, Bet On Chart became the first real in-play football betting platform. With Bet On Chart you are sure in any moment of the game.  Check how the widget looks like on: http://bit.ly/2K3RSxn  Watch football live, like you’re on the stadium 🏟️. Bet on football with confidence 📈, because you know who’s gonna be better. Get profit in football with Bet on Chart!
